MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:58am. Our engineers are on their way to the Greenend Avenue substation to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:44am on 7th February 2021
